snippet.title: UNYIELDER Prologue Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Step into UNYIELDER, a fast-paced, boss-rush roguelite FPS where precision, movement, and adaptability define survival. This Prologue Demo offers the most comprehensive look yet, featuring expanded combat mechanics, a broader arsenal, and intense new encounters. Engage in high-speed battles across new environments, experiment with an enhanced perk system, and experience the story-driven prologue, introducing key figures of EREBUS.

Jump in, test your skills, and prove your unyielding will. Will you rise to become the ultimate boss?

■ WISHLIST ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/789940/UNYIELDER/
■ Discord: https://discord.gg/snpewutJ2U

Genre: Roguelite FPS
Platform: Steam®
Release Date: Expected 2025
Developer: TrueWorld Studios

A Vastly Expanded Arsenal
Your weapons define your playstyle, and the prologue demo gives you more firepower than ever before:
🔹 New weapons: CALDERA (a rocket launcher with homing capabilities), DOWNPOUR (a drum-fed machine gun) and BASTET (a new look at an old friend)! 
🔹 Expanded weapon mod system that transforms every weapon into a force to be reckoned with 
🔹 New multi-tiered perk system makes every run unique - every tier grants strange new perks to test out!
🔹 Break the game with up to 40 unique perks for nigh-infinite combinations 

Every shot, dodge, and moment counts - hesitate, and you die.  Explore every perk and weapon to find which one suits you best!
